shortDescription: Directory traversal vulnerability in Ecava IntegraXor 3.6.4000.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the file_name parameter in an open request.
vulnerabilityName: ecava integraxor Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
